hanzi-su-wiki:
誕

Значения

Рождаться

Мнемоника

Рассказывать 言 длинно 延, т.е. с подробностями, преувеличивать, чваниться. День рождения — о нём говорят более остальных.

Варианты

诞
purpleculture_pinyin:
dàn
birth; birthday; brag; boast; to increase
рождение; день рождения; хвастаться; хвастаться; увеличить

誕誕RS
诞诞		to bear children, give birth, birth

(Simplified: 诞)
Pictophonetic: 延 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
誕生 [ dàn shēng ]: to be born
誕辰 [ dàn chén ]: birthday
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 延 [ yán ] to defer, to delay, to postpone; to extend, to prolong; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: Nativity = born, being born. Think of birth as a painful and prolonged event. And of course, all the words and curses being yelled at the soon-to-be father for doing this to her!
heisig_constituent: nativity, say, words, keitai, mouth, prolonged, drop, stop, footprint, stretch
heisig_story: The key word of course calls to mind the feast of Christmas. As the famous poem at the start of St. John's gospel tells us, the nativity we celebrate at Christmas had its origins at the very start of time and governs all of human history: it represents the prolongation of the eternal Word in time and space.
myStory: сначала я кричал, потом первый шаг, большие шаги
Keyword_KANJIDIC: nativity, be born, declension, lie, be arbitrary
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: вертеп, рождаться, склонение, ложь, быть произвольным
koohiiStory1: Nativity = born, being born. Think of birth as a painful and prolonged event. And of course, all the words and curses being yelled at the soon-to-be father for doing this to her!
koohiiStory2: When you are being born ( nativity ), your mother´s WORDS are PROLONGED. (Thiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiis huuuuuuuuuuuuuurtss a lottttttttt~!! Owwwwwww!!!).
jp_example_words:
誕生(たんじょう): birth
誕生日(たんじょうび): birthday
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: They say yoga is the correct way to go through birth. Birth isn't easy, but people keep telling you that yoga is the right way to prepare and actually do it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture multiple people you know saying you should do yoga if you plan to give birth. It isn't a question of whether you want to, it's the correct way to do it. So you should.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To prepare for giving birth you end up doing so much yoga outside that you get a really deep tan (たん).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Hopefully having a tan doesn't make birth harder, since you've worked so hard to do this the correct way with so much yoga.
Ru_Meaning: nativity, be born, declension, lie, be arbitrary
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 廴 (тянуть), 止 (останавливать), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese: dàn: (сущ/прил) рождение; день рождения; немыслимый, абсурдный, нелепый
Kanshudo_mnemonic: there's a delay (延) between words (言) and birth
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: During nativity a woman screams prolonged words.
humanum_short_description_en: " Nan " means false words, empty words, and fraud. The foreign body is also called "唌". "Shuowen": "Birthday, the word is born. From the words to the sound. 𧥡, the birth of the text is correct." "Guangyun. " Han Yun": "Birth, deceive also." "Ji Yun": "Also used as 唌." See "唌".
humanum_short_description: 「誕」表示虛妄之言，空言，欺詐。異體又作「唌」。《說文》：「誕，詞誕也。从言延聲。𧥡，籒文誕省正。」《廣韻．旱韻》：「誕，欺也。」《集韻》：「亦作唌。」參見「唌」。

誕字的基本解释

誕
dàn
见“诞”。

誕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàn］
［《廣韻》徒旱切，上旱，定。］
“诞1”的繁体字。亦作“訑2”。
(1)指言论虚妄夸诞，说大话。
(2)大，程度、情势等不同一般。参见“誕告”。
(3)宽阔；长大。
(4)虚妄；荒诞。
(5)欺骗，欺诈。
(6)放肆；放纵。
(7)生育；出生。
(8)泛指产生。
(9)生日。
(10)信。
(11)助词。用于句首或句中，无实义。
(12)传说中的兽名。

誕字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誕； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1162第05
【廣韻】徒旱切【集韻】【韻會】蕩旱切【正韻】徒亶切，?音袒。【說文】詞誕也。【徐曰】妄爲大言也。【廣韻】欺也。【書·無逸】乃逸乃諺旣誕。【蔡傳】誕妄。【孔傳】欺誕。【史記·扁鵲傳】先生得無誕之乎。【荀子·修身篇】易言曰誕。【說苑·尊賢篇】口銳者多誕而寡信。　又【正韻】放也。【左傳·昭元年】伯州犁曰：子姑憂子晢之欲背誕也。【註】放誕也。【晉書·羊曼傳】阮孚爲誕伯。　又【爾雅·釋詁】大也。【書·大禹謨】帝乃誕敷文德。【傳】大也。【詩·大雅】誕彌厥月。【毛傳】大也。【朱傳】發語辭。　又【字彙】闊也。【詩·國風】旄丘之葛兮，何誕之節兮。【箋】土氣緩，則葛生闊節。　又【廣韻】育也。【後漢·裴楷傳】昔文王一妻，誕致十子。【晉書·袁宏傳】誕靈物以瑞德。　又【玉篇】天子生曰降誕。【後漢·虞美人傳】誕生聖皇。【舊唐書·德宗紀】上誕日不納中外之貢。　又【廣雅】信也。　又誕馬。【唐書·儀衞志】一品鹵簿有誕馬六。【宋史·儀衞志】誕馬，散馬也。　又國名。【魏志·東夷傳】

birth
Basic explanation of words
birth
dàn
See "Birthday".
birth
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàn］
["Guangyun" is only dry cut, dry up, fixed. ]
The traditional characters of "親1". Also known as "Xi 2".
(1) Refers to vain and boastful remarks and big talk.
(2) Big, different in degree and situation. See "Announcement".
(3) Broad; grow up.
(4) Falsehood; absurdity.
(5) Deception, fraud.
(6) Indulgent; indulgent.
(7) Birth; birth.
(8) Generally refers to production.
(9) Birthday.
(10) Letter.
(11) Particles. Used at the beginning of a sentence or in a sentence, with no real meaning.
(12) The legendary animal name.
birth

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Birthday; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1162 No. 05
[Guang Yun] Cut dry only [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Cut dry dry [Zheng Yun] Cut dry only,? Tone. [Said Wen] The word is also born. [Xu Yue] It's arrogant. [Guang Yun] Cheating too. 【Book·Wu Yi】is Yi Yi is a proverb. [Cai Chuan] Birth. [Kong Chuan] Deception. 【Historical Records·Bian Que Biography】Mr. [Xunzi·Self-cultivation Chapter] Yiyan says birthday. 【Suoyuan·Zunxian Article】Many people with sharp-sounding mouths are born but few believers.　 [Zheng Yun] Put it again. [Zuo Zhuan·First Year of Zhao] Baizhou Li said: Zigu is worried about Zizhen's desire to give birth. [Note] It's also a birthday party. [Book of Jin·Yangman Biography] Ruan Fu is the uncle Dan.　[Erya·Shi Xie] Da Ye. 【Book·Dayu Mo】The emperor was born and put on texts and virtues. [Biography] Da Ye. 【Poetry·Daya】Birthday is Mijueyue. [Mao Biography] Da Ye. [Zhu Chuan] Speech.　 [Words] Kuo Ye. 【Poetry·Guofeng】The Gexi of Yanqiu, the festival of Christmas. [Note] If it is rustic and slow, then Ge Shengkuojie.　[Guang Yun] Yu Ye. [Later Han·Pei Kai Biography] Xiwen Wang had one wife and gave birth to ten sons. 【Book of Jin·Yuan Hong Chuan】The birth of a spiritual thing is based on Red.　[Jade articles] The emperor is born and said to be born. 【The Legend of the Later Han·The Poppy】The Holy Emperor was born. [Old Tang Book·De Zong Ji] No Chinese or foreign tribute will be paid on the birthday.　[Guang Ya] Xin Ye.　Horse was born again. 【Tang Shu·Yi Wei Zhi】The first-grade halogen book has six births. [Song History·Yiweizhi] A horse is born and a horse is scattered.　 Also the name of the country. 【Biography of Wei Zhi·Dong Yi】

birth
Name meaning
Nothing.
dàn
вм. 诞
Radicals: 言, 廴, 正  (say, yoga, correct)
Meaning Mnemonic
They say yoga is the correct way to go through birth. Birth isn't easy, but people keep telling you that yoga is the right way to prepare and actually do it.
Picture multiple people you know saying you should do yoga if you plan to give birth. It isn't a question of whether you want to, it's the correct way to do it. So you should.
Reading Mnemonic
To prepare for giving birth you end up doing so much yoga outside that you get a really deep tan (たん).
Hopefully having a tan doesn't make birth harder, since you've worked so hard to do this the correct way with so much yoga.
